quote: She was all the worldâ€™s money, and I would spend it with her, my sharpest friend who changed the tide, my only comfort from the brutal gamble of the world and the wicked ways of men.
quote_letters: SHE WAS ALL THE WORLDS MONEY AND I WOULD SPEND IT WITH HER MY SHARPEST FRIEND WHO CHANGED THE TIDE MY ONLY COMFORT FROM THE BRUTAL GAMBLE OF THE WORLD AND THE WICKED WAYS OF MEN
